message.content:
cs.SE, cs.CR, cs.CY, cs.PL, cs.SD. 

This paper discusses the need for a maturity model for research software security, which falls under the software engineering (cs.SE) and cybersecurity (cs.CR) sub-categories. The paper also mentions the importance of identity, authentication, and authorization, which are relevant to the computer systems and network (cs.CY) sub-category. The proposal for a roadmap for advancing the security maturity of software aligns with the programming languages (cs.PL) and software development (cs.SD) sub-categories.
